title: Road Ambush, Underforge Refusal, and Glenmoril Heads
session_summary: Elitrof exited Dustman's Cairn at dawn with the Wuuthrad fragment, intercepted a Silver Hand road intimidation attempt (killing one and capturing two), then returned to Jorrvaskr where Skjor revealed the Inner Circle secret. Elitrof refused the beast blood on Sovngarde principle, swore the Oath of Silence, and pledged himself to Kodlak's cure-path. Using prisoner intel and a Harbinger-sanctioned strike plan, Elitrof led Farkas and Vilkas to the Glenmoril Coven, baited them at a bridge choke-point, and secured three witch heads including the Hagraven matron.
